attacks.name: Powerful Spark
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Lightning Energy attached to your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Thunder
attacks.effect: This Pokémon does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Voltail-GX
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
